mapper.select: select schedule_no, user_no, schedule_title, schedule_content, TO_CHAR(schedule_start, 'yyyy-mm-dd"T"hh24:mi:ss') as schedule_start, TO_CHAR(schedule_end, 'yyyy-mm-dd"T"hh24:mi:ss') as schedule_end, schedule_color, schedule_importance, schedule_progresStat, schedule_allday, schedule_authority, schedule_type from tbl_fsemi_schedule where schedule_type = 0 and user_no = 1
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_fsemi_schedule(schedule_no, user_no, schedule_title, schedule_content, schedule_start, schedule_end, schedule_color, schedule_importance, schedule_progresStat, schedule_allday, schedule_authority, schedule_type) values(seq_fsemi_schedul.nextval, #{user_no}, #{}, ?, to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), ?, 0, 0, ?, 0, ?)
